channel.title: Music & Sound
channel.description: You can find help with music and sound effects in this forum.

item.title: out-of-box Unreal Media Ripper?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ironword300)
item.dc:creator: Ironword300
item.content:encoded:
Apologies if this is answered already somewhere, but I did a search in this forum for "media ripper" and got zero results.

I'm a total technical doofus--can't even get UnrealEd to open on my system, let alone use it for anything. That's my level of technical expertise. So I'm hoping to extract sound files for my listening pleasure with Unreal Media Ripper, as Unreal Music Ripper hiccups on all sorts of stuff if it's not from original Unreal. But I can't find a compiled, ready-to-use version...

out-of-box Unreal Media Ripper?

item.title: [Audio] UE4 pitch modulation comparison table
item.author: invalid@example.com (doublereso)
item.dc:creator: doublereso
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone!

I always wonder how exactly pitch modulation works in Unreal Engine 4. So I take the tuner and thoroughly investigate this question. Here is what I came up with - the comparison table of UE4 pitch modulation.

Hope it helps someone!

item.title: Batman Arkham Asylum Music Rip
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cameron007)
item.dc:creator: Cameron007
item.content:encoded: Can someone please tell me how to rip the music from B:AA? I can't find the FSB files anywhere, all I can find is RFMODSOUND, which doesn't do anything.

item.title: Help! Sound Browser not working
item.author: invalid@example.com (K)
item.dc:creator: K
item.content:encoded:
This is really pissing me off and i guess i cant figure it out by myself.

When i open the sound browser and select a sound , and press play . . . . .

Nothing happens
It doesn't play the sound. WTF?

I have tried closing all other programs and then booting ED. same results.

Has any one heard of this happening?
I'm about finished with a new map except for the sounds.
How do i fix this?

item.title: Weapons Of The Gods Unpacker
item.author: invalid@example.com (CriticalError)
item.dc:creator: CriticalError
item.content:encoded:
Hello to all, well I wanna know if possible get a unpacker for this sounds, the game is powered by Unreal Engine 3 and is WOA, well here I upload a sample of sound files in UPK format, ok thanks a lot for all and cheers.

SoundModes.upk

item.title: Playing a sound when vehicle has collision with other objects
item.author: invalid@example.com (Abbas.abdolmaleki)
item.dc:creator: Abbas.abdolmaleki
item.content:encoded:
Hello every body

I have modeled a wheelchair using Unreal Tournament 2004. How i can attach a sound to my wheelchair(staticmesh) that when my wheelchair has any collision with any object like wall or ... that sound plays?

P.S. I'm working with Unreal Tournament 2004. It is a scientific project and i have simulated a wheelchair using unreal tournament and now i want to know when my wheelchair has any collision with other objects in the map by playing a sound.

Thanks in advance

item.title: umx -> Mp3?
item.author: invalid@example.com (RABIES)
item.dc:creator: RABIES
item.content:encoded: Is there a .umx --> .Mp3 converter available?

item.title: UT Music for UT2003
item.author: invalid@example.com (Iceburgs)
item.dc:creator: Iceburgs
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys, just pimping a thread I ran in a different forum. Enjoy!
================================================

Hola Peeps,

I don't know about you guys, but I really loved the music from the original UT and have found that I actually miss it. Don't get me wrong, the music in UT2003 is pretty good too ... well, some of it, but lately I find when I am playing late at night, that I miss the UT music. So, I did some extensive searching for the UT music, converted to .ogg for use in...

UT Music for UT2003

item.content:encoded: I was just wondering what everyones favourite UMX file is (in others the UT music) I think mine at the moment has gotta be 'EvilComes' i can't remember which map i got this with but its my personal favourite what about everyone else?

item.title: heya guys need a little info on music
item.author: invalid@example.com (DEADAN)
item.dc:creator: DEADAN
item.content:encoded: hey guys this is my frist post almost done with my first ut3 map and got the song i have to play fine in the editor but when i play the map in the game itself no sound kinda stumped here any help on this would help me out big time thanks

item.title: Ambient Zone settings
item.author: invalid@example.com (Coxy001)
item.dc:creator: Coxy001
item.content:encoded:
Hi all,
I'm trying to set up an ambient zone to simulate underwater sound. In my ReverbVolume settings I am unable to see an option to enable Ambient Zone Settings. Instead, there is a line saying :
bIsWorldInfo=False,ExteriorVolume=1.000000,ExteriorTime=0.500000,ExteriorLPF=1.000000,ExteriorLPFTim e=0.500000,InteriorVolume=0.500000,InteriorTime=0.500000,InteriorLPF=1.000000,InteriorLPFTime=0.5000000

As a result, it doesn't matter which settings I alter, it has no effect even after I...

Ambient Zone settings

item.title: Musicalgame
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mtech)
item.dc:creator: Mtech
item.content:encoded:
Hi there im a student studying interactive music and have just started using the unreal engine 3. For part of a project I would like to make a game using musical patterns but im not quite sure where to start. Basically a musical pattern would be played and then the player would have to recreate the pattern by shooting certain objects assigned to one note. I wondered if anyone could point me in the right direction or perhaps show me a tutorial or thread where this has already been covered....

Musicalgame

item.title: Sound Cue Editor - Delay?
item.author: invalid@example.com (jaytaylor)
item.dc:creator: jaytaylor
item.content:encoded:
Hello.

Hoping somebody can help me, and this might be a stupid question, but every time I use the 'delay' object in Sound Cue Editor, the sound just stops.

I had it working at one stage but 1 didn't seem to mean 1 second, what is it measured in? Everywhere said seconds..I must be doing something wrong?

Ie here I want a wind sound looping, some other wind gust sounds to play now and then with delay, and hawk sound to play now and then (random delays)

Thanks guys

item.title: Extracting sounds from Batman Arkham Asylum
item.author: invalid@example.com (murxx)
item.dc:creator: murxx
item.content:encoded:
Hey everybody,

I'm a big fan of Batman Arkham Asylum and would really love to have one certain sound (the piano jingle that always plays, when Joker speaks to you over the Arkham comm-system) as a ringtone on my phone.

I've tried recording it with my laptop, but there is always background noise.

Since Batman is a Unreal 3 game, I though you guys might be able to help me. Do you guys perhaps know a way to extract sounds from Batman? I've tried opening some UPK-files with...

Extracting sounds from Batman Arkham Asylum

item.title: Custom weapon&footsteps sound & a rather generic question
item.author: invalid@example.com (felix)
item.dc:creator: felix
item.content:encoded:
Howdy!

1.) As I am starting to learn using the Unreal Editor, I still have no idea how to implement your own weapon-, footsteps- and taunting-sounds etc.

I did a search on this forum - most of the questions regarding this weren't answered at all; there's just one single thread where somebody stated that you actually have to create your own "species" for doing that, as these sounds are hard-coded; so this would involve *lots* of coding + all infos on how about doing this seem to be...

Custom weapon&footsteps sound & a rather generic question

item.title: Unreal II Music - Problem with *.con files.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Delacroix)
item.dc:creator: Delacroix
item.content:encoded:
The title says it all... Is there any way to open these files? What option in UnrealEd should I use? How to convert them to wav/mp3/ogg or sth like that? I mean exactly these files:

AcheronE3.con
Angels.con
Body.con
DrakkBoss.con
Intro.con
M01.con
M08.con
Sulferon.con

all located in Unreal II/Music folder. Please help.

item.content:encoded:
Hey all!

Is there a way to add Reverberation to a sound for Unreal Tournament 3?

item.title: This is how i add music in my maps on 2k3 or 2k4
item.author: invalid@example.com (moneyshot)
item.dc:creator: moneyshot
item.content:encoded:
i no there is a few ways to add music into ur maps. but this is the way i do it. itll work for 2k3 and 2k4. if u do use 2k4 tho i suggest u get XxxXmusic fix mutator. so when u die or use a trans the music dont start over.
but here goes. make sure ur music file is WAV winamp will convert ur music for u. i use xp pro so i got sound recorder built right into xp, go to start > all programs > accessories >entertianment> sound recorder.. in recorder open ur wav file u want to use then click...

This is how i add music in my maps on 2k3 or 2k4
